Text: PST Wow its so weird reading these types of articles and seeing names of people you knew very closely I can just imagine the nightmare that everyone there is going through Has anyone heard how Jennifer Kate etc are doing Hopefully they are hanging in there By the way I have some good news I have two offers to stay and work here in London One is from BP and the other one is from a company called Trade Capture The role is very similar at both except one if a well established old company while the other one is very young Advantages to both so just need to decide which route I want to take I will keep you posted Miss you guys Imelda apfenroninvestigationhtml Join the worlds largest email service with MSN Hotmail
